comments:
Hello,

im getting these two errors when opening a JIRA-task in Eclipse:

MSG 1: ----------------------------------------------------------------------
eclipse.buildId=I20061102-1715
java.version=1.6.0_01
java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc.
BootLoader constants: OS=win32, ARCH=x86, WS=win32, NL=de_DE

Error
Sun May 06 18:47:14 CEST 2007
Could not download report


java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.mylar.internal.jira.ui.JiraTaskDataHandler.updateTaskData(JiraTaskDataHandler.java:191)
	at org.eclipse.mylar.internal.jira.ui.JiraTaskDataHandler.getTaskData(JiraTaskDataHandler.java:69)

	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:55)

and

MSG2: ------------------------------------------------------------------------

Error
Sun May 06 18:47:14 CEST 2007
Unhandled event loop exception

org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Failed to execute runnable (java.lang.NullPointerException)
	at org.eclipse.swt.SWT.error(SWT.java:3547)

Caused by: java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.mylar.tasks.ui.editors.AbstractRepositoryTaskEditor.addSummaryText(AbstractRepositoryTaskEditor.java:1009)

I am able to synchronise the task list with the repository but opening does not work (additionally, if I choose the browser view instead, if have to login again once before I'm able to view a task's details).

(JIRA-connector version: 2.0.0.v20070403-1300)

Kind regards

Karsten
I've just checked, if opening and editing (e.g. add a comment) a task works with JIRA Dashboard. It does. But I'd really prefer using Mylar instead ;-)
Ok. I've just installed the current DEV build for 3.3M7 (JIRA-connector version 2.0.0.v20070504-1930) and opening/editing tasks works!
Good to hear.  Please consider updating to to 2.0.0.v20070506-2200 which contains a fix for bug 185578.
